content: this legal text summarizes a court case involving two former spouses mr mo ig and ms ti br the court has ordered the dissolution of their community property and the division of their assets located in campi bisenzio an expert appointed by the court ar pa has determined the allocation of the assets based on their value ms ti br has been assigned a flat while mr mo ig has been assigned a flat and a garage the court has also ordered the payment of certain sums of money between the parties the division of the property was based on a settlement agreement signed by both parties additionally the right of habitation initially held by ms ti br has been assigned to mr mo ig both parties have jointly filed an appeal regarding the property conditions of their divorce the court ruling was made on february 17 2017 in florence
